items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
items.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

items.content_html: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.
items.title: karimz1/imgcompress: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.

items.content_html: A collection of reusable, high-performance React hooks for modern web development. Simplify state management, API calls, UI interactions, and more with these lightweight, well-documented hooks. Designed for efficiency and scalability in React projects.

items.content_html: This is a Node.js application that integrates with Telex for message processing using AI capabilities. The application uses Hono as a lightweight web framework to run on any Node.js environment, such as EC2.
